verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will praise you
With all my Heart
I will Sing to you
With all my Best

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
My Faith is to believe in you
You are my God
And our Father Bring

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sacrifice
Through His Son
And I Found your Grace and Peace
Through His love
JESUS.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
You are Great God
You are Almighty God
Your my Savior
